subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/don't_forget_the_sandwich-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : This evp says "don't forget the sandwich" and is funny because I stopped at Arby's on the way home. Had ARBYS on my mind :) And didnt even know it.......scary. Hahahahaha. This one was at the end of the recording from tonight. Heard  " Hey Hommie-Momma said I;m a big girl" for a total of 3 different voices at the water trough tonight during a 4 minute recording. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/don%27t_forget_the_sandwich-evp.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
